title: Superpositions, Sudoku, the Wave Function Collapse algorithm.

media:group.media:title: Superpositions, Sudoku, the Wave Function Collapse algorithm.
media:group.media:description:
In this video I explore the wave function collapse algorithm, and explain how I went about implementing it using Blender and Godot.

WFC demos on itch:
https://bolddunkley.itch.io/wfc-mixed
https://bolddunkley.itch.io/wave-function-collapse

References:
https://marian42.de/article/wfc/
http://oskarstalberg.com/game/wave/wave.html
https://github.com/mxgmn/WaveFunctionCollapse
https://robertheaton.com/2018/12/17/wavefunction-collapse-algorithm/

Me:
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/bolddunkley
Twitter https://twitter.com/bolddunkley
itch.io https://bolddunkley.itch.io/

Software used for this video:
(Content)
Blender 2.8 https://www.blender.org/
Godot 3.2 https://godotengine.org/
OBS https://obsproject.com/
Kdenlive https://kdenlive.org/en/
